proper.translate: надлежащий, правильный, собственный, должный, подходящий, настоящий, истинный
examples: It is not proper to speak that way.
The children need to learn proper behavior.
You need to eat a proper meal instead of junk food.
I want our lass to have a proper education.
Is this the proper spelling of your name?
His attitude shows a want of proper respect.
Capital letter is used in all proper names.
He finally has a proper job.
I didn't have a proper holiday this year.
Each step must be done in the proper order.
I haven't learned proper pronunciation of French words.
I beg you to provide him with proper directions for finding me in London.
Make sure you put everything back in its proper place.
These children need a proper home life.

a disgraceful want of proper care
